Lab lunch because Max Whitney is leaving

21 May 2013

We are doing lab lunch at Bandidas Taqueria on Wednesday May 22 at 12:00 noon, because Max is leaving. This will replace the usual lab meeting. Bandidas is located at 2781 Commercial Drive, Vancouver.
